text: Romano Carancini (born 5 January 1961 in Macerata) is an Italian politician. A member of the Democratic Party, he was elected Mayor of Macerata on 13 April 2010 and re-confirmed for a second term on 15 June 2015. ==References== ==See also== *2010 Italian local elections *2015 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Macerata ==External links== * * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Macerata Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Romano Carancini
